alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 2:22PM PST until December 20 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SUNDAY TO 3 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 6to 11 inches north of Mt Jefferson and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...From 4 AM Sunday to 3 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
